title: How to Make Cake Flour

steps.headline: Measure and add 1 cup all-purpose flour to a mixing bowl.
Add 2 tablespoons of cornstarch to the bowl.
Mix to sift together the cornstarch and flour mixture.
steps.description: The mixture will need to get mixed thoroughly if you want a light and fluffy cake flour.

steps.headline: Continue with your regular baking recipe.

Use a spoon to fill up the rest with the all-purpose flour.
Add the mixture to your mixing bowl.
